summary: Use this API to edit Manual Selection Product Ads
description: Use this API to edit Manual Selection Product Ads

query.name: reference_id
query.description: A random string used to prevent duplicate ads. If an ads is created successfully, subsequent request using the same reference id will fail

query.name: product_selection
query.description: auto,manual - for Auto product ads or Manual Product Ads

query.name: bidding_method
query.description: Bidding Method of product ad: auto, manual

query.name: enhanced_cpc
query.description: Enhanced CPC functionality toggle. Values supported "true"/"false". Mandatory for product_selection=manual, bidding_method=manual

query.name: discovery_ads_location_names
query.description: List of comma separated location values from: daily_discover, you_may_also_like. Mandatory for product_selection=manual, product_placement={all|discovery}, bidding_method=manual

query.name: roas_target
query.description: the ROAS target for each campaign with auto bidding. If 0, GMV Max / ROI feature is not enabled

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.test.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/ads/get_create_product_ad_budget_suggestion?access_token=access_token&bidding_method=manual&campaign_placement=all&discovery_ads_location_names=daily_discover%2Cyou_may_also_like&enhanced_cpc=true&item_id=112233&partner_id=partner_id&product_selection=auto&reference_id=asdf-1234-qwerty&roas_target=1.2&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'GET',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;
